code: export function SplitDateAndTime(dateAndTime){if(dateAndTime===''||!dateAndTime){return'';}var dateNTime=dateAndTime.split('T',2);var date=dateNTime[0].split('-',3);var time=dateNTime[1].split('.',1);time=time[0].split(':',2);return"".concat(time[0],":").concat(time[1]," ").concat(date[2],"/").concat(date[1],"/").concat(date[0]);}export function ConvertDateForDisplay(dateAndTime){if(dateAndTime===''||!dateAndTime){return['','',''];}var month=['Jan','Feb','Mar','Apr','May','Jun','Jul','Aug','Sep','Oct','Nov','Dec'];var dateNTime=SplitDateAndTime(dateAndTime);var date=dateNTime.split(' ');date=date[1].split('/');return[date[0],month[Number(date[1])-1],date[2]];}export function ConvertDateFoCal(dateAndTime){var res=SplitDateAndTime(dateAndTime).split(' ')[1];return"".concat(res.split('/')[2],"-").concat(res.split('/')[1],"-").concat(res.split('/')[0]);}
